CustomField.description: Named Credential used for HITL-approved tool execution. Determines the user context for tool execution after approval.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the Named Credential to use for HITL tool execution. The Named Credential's authentication determines the execution context (e.g., service user, per-user). Default: AgentStudioInternalAPI
CustomField.label: HITL Approval Named Credential
